 591: # From wikipedia: Welfords algorithm
 592: # for a new value newValue, compute the new count, new mean, the new M2.
 593: # mean accumulates the mean of the entire dataset
 594: # M2 aggregates the squared distance from the mean
 595: # count aggregates the number of samples seen so far
 596: # cdef float update(float count, float mean, float M2, char newValue):
 597: #     cdef float delta, delta2
 598: #     count += 1
 599: #     delta = newValue - mean
 600: #     mean += delta / count
 601: #     delta2 = newValue - mean
 602: #     M2 += delta * delta2
 603: #
 604: #     return (count, mean, M2)
 605: 
 606: # retrieve the mean, variance and sample variance from an aggregate
 607: # def finalize(float count, float M2):
 608: #     cdef float variance sample_variance
 609: #     if count < 2:
 610: #         return 1
 611: #
 612: #     variance = M2 / count
 613: #     sampleVariance = M2 / (count - 1)
 614: #
 615: #     return variance, sampleVariance
